mapper.select: SELECT sale_date,purchase_date,SUM(t1.amount_paid) saleTotal,SUM(t2.amount_paid) purchasingTotal FROM t_sale_list t1 LEFT JOIN t_purchase_list t2 ON t1.sale_date = t2.purchase_date GROUP BY sale_date HAVING sale_date BETWEEN #{sTime} AND #{eTime} UNION SELECT sale_date,purchase_date,SUM(t4.amount_paid) saleTotal,SUM(t3.amount_paid) purchasingTotal FROM t_purchase_list t3 LEFT JOIN t_sale_list t4 ON t3.purchase_date = t4.sale_date GROUP BY purchase_date HAVING purchase_date BETWEEN #{sTime} AND #{eTime}
